name: Sloops in Spaaaaace!
description:
Our current progress for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. Sadly we have no more time to give to the project during the jam, but we're submitting in honour of what we have achieved in our first ever game jam! 

Controls are on the screen, you must protect the circle in the centre from the attackers, you can shoot them and if they manage to get past you and break off a bit of the ship, you can use your tractor beam to pull the piece back in and reattach it. The gun has a shot count of 100 bullets before it needs a three second reload.

If you hit a game over, the game will just stop, there is no indication of a game over as yet, but we will revisit this project after the jam is over!

We hope you enjoy the game in it's current state, if you have any feedback for us, please let us know!
